name: Harry Potter
description: The boy who lived, harry was marked by the dark lord and their lives became intwined

name: Hermione Granger
description: Hermione is a gifted muggle born witch, she studies hard and keeps her best friends Ron and Harry in line

name: Ronald Weasley
description: Ron is Harry and Hermione's best friend, between the three of them they help and support Harry through his trails

name: Rubeus Hagrid
description: Hagrid is keeper of keys and grounds at hogwarts, he has a foundness for exotic pets

name: Albus Dumbledore
description: During a long and eventful life Albus dumbledore was notably the headmaster of Hogwarts and battled dark forces dueling with Lord Voldemort and Grindelwald

name: Severus Snape
description: Snape is the potion master at Hogwarts, he is a compicated character with a dark past

name: Lord Voldemort
description: Tom Riddle became Lord voldemort the darkest and most feared wizard ever, he ran a group called the death eaters.

name: Draco Malfoy
description: Draco was born into a privileged wizarding family and had his father's strong ideas instilled in him, Draco became a death eater at only 17
